csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.1mlz1">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <macro name="container-title">
    <text strip-periods="true" variable="container-title" form="short" />
  </macro>
  <macro name="author">
    <names variable="author" >
      <name and="symbol" name-as-sort-order="first" delimiter-precedes-last="never" initialize-with="" initialize="false">
	    <name-part name="given"/>
	  </name>
    </names>
  </macro>
  <citation et-al-min="4" et-al-use-first="1" >
    <layout delimiter="; " suffix="." >
      <text macro="author"/>
    </layout>
  </citation>
  <bibliography>
    <layout>
      <text macro="author"/>
    </layout>
  </bibliography> 
</style>
result: Doe, John J, Jane G Roe & Richard Q Snoakes.
